data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Campbell, Lisa M., Dorr, Laurence J. (2013): A synopsis of Harperocallis (Tofieldiaceae, Alismatales) with ten new combinations. PhytoKeys 21: 37-52, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.21.4859, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/phytokeys.21.4859
